table.name: green_banche
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `green_banche` ( `bancheid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `nomebanca` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bancaattiva` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `dettaglibanca` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `iban` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `banca_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: green_banchecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `green_banchecf` ( `bancheid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bancheid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
